It's not "so good it's bad".
It's so completely uninspired and unimaginative that it's dull.
It's the same market tested, psuedo-"wholesome", derivative shit done better and with more ambition a hundred times before.

People in this place over-use the term, but I can't think of a single game, even those mass produced triple A abominations, that deserves the title "Soulless" as much as Tunic.
Those other games never pretended to have soul, Tunic presents itself as being pure soul when it's anything but.
It's a tortured, mechanical recreation of something the artists remembered used to have soul, but are completely unable to grasp themselves.

They call it an homage, a spiritual successor. These are buzz words.
It's a soulless copy, a worthless and pale imitation.

Solid 4/10

last_replies.name: Anonymous
last_replies.com:
>>618826417
>witch
Patron based with a focus on primal spells. Often hexes and debuffs.
>Sorceress
Innate spell casting abilities allowing them to gather power quickly and grow that power as they continue aging. Mostly focused on destructive magics or self augmenting magic
>Mage
Those who train and study magic, the most common type of magic user and can get a wide spread of magic. Can be of any flavor or specialization. Power scales late game.
